entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
